curam.util.ctm.bom.businessobjectinformation

Interface BusinessObjectActionData


  • public interface BusinessObjectActionData

    Interface that groups BusinessObjectIdentifier and its related information which is primarily used to simplify passing related information to various BOM API methods.

    Infrastructure while processing a change set will encounter business object identifiers that may need to be passed to various BOM modules. However, there are instances where the infrastructure needs to pass on related information such as the 'Action' string and the XML document fragment for the business object instance to various API methods. Hence this interface provides a way to group related information so that it will be convenient for the BOM to correlate the related information about a business object instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAction()
      The action string for the business object identifier which can be Add or Delete.
      org.w3c.dom.Document getBusinessObjectDocument()
      Returns the XML document fragment that represents the entire business object content for the business object identifier.
      BusinessObjectIdentifier getBusinessObjectIdentifier()
      Returns the identifier that uniquely identifies a business object instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getBusinessObjectIdentifier

        BusinessObjectIdentifier getBusinessObjectIdentifier()
        Returns the identifier that uniquely identifies a business object instance. Refer BusinessObjectIdentifier for more details.
        Returns:
        The business object identifier object for the corresponding business object instance.

      • getAction

        java.lang.String getAction()
        The action string for the business object identifier which can be Add or Delete.
        Returns:
        The action string for the corresponding business object identifier.

      • getBusinessObjectDocument

        org.w3c.dom.Document getBusinessObjectDocument()
        Returns the XML document fragment that represents the entire business object content for the business object identifier.
        Returns:
        The XML document fragment for the corresponding business object identifier.
